description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，汉族。曾任中华人民共和国审计署审计长、中共山东省委书记、山东省人大常委会主任、全国人民代表大会财政经济委员会副主任委员。
description.en: Chinese politician of Han ethnicity. He has served as Auditor General of the National Audit Office of the People's Republic of China, Secretary of the Shandong Provincial Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Shandong Provincial People's Congress, and Vice Chairman of the Financial and Economic Affairs Committee of the National People's Congress.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会财政经济委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会财政经济委员会

description.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会的专门委员会之一，受全国人民代表大会领导；在全国人民代表大会闭会期间，受全国人民代表大会常务委员会领导。
description.en: One of the special committees of the National People's Congress (NPC), under the leadership of the NPC. During the recess of the NPC, it is under the leadership of the Standing Committee of the NPC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任全国人民代表大会财政经济委员会主任委员。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Chairman of the Financial and Economic Affairs Committee of the National People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国共产党山东省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党山东省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在山东省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Chinese Communist Party in Shandong Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，刘家义的前任中共山东省委书记及山东省人大常委会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, predecessor of Liu Jiayi as the Secretary of the Shandong Provincial Committee of the CCP and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Shandong Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，刘家义的继任中共山东省委书记及山东省人大常委会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, successor to Liu Jiayi as the Secretary of the Shandong Provincial Committee of the CCP and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Shandong Provincial People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国审计署

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国审计署

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院组成部门，主管全国的审计工作。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for auditing work nationwide.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，刘家义的前任中华人民共和国审计署审计长。
description.en: Chinese politician, predecessor of Liu Jiayi as the Auditor General of the National Audit Office of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，刘家义的继任中华人民共和国审计署审计长。
description.en: Chinese politician, successor to Liu Jiayi as the Auditor General of the National Audit Office of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 山东省人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing body of the Shandong Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会直属的机构。
description.en: An institution directly under the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 联合国大会的附属机构。
description.en: A subsidiary body of the United Nations General Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, current General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 西亚国家，位于阿拉伯半岛东部。
description.en: A country in Western Asia, located at the eastern end of the Arabian Peninsula.

description.zh-cn: 在一年制中青年干部培训班学习。
description.en: Studied in the one-year training program for young and middle-aged cadres.

position.zh-cn: 二处副处长、综合处副处长
position.en: Deputy Director of the Second Division and Deputy Director of the General Division

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国审计署
中华人民共和国审计署

description.zh-cn: 刘家义在温家宝担任国务院总理期间任审计署审计长。
description.en: Liu Jiayi served as Auditor General while Wen Jiabao was the Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 刘家义在李克强担任国务院总理期间任审计署审计长。
description.en: Liu Jiayi served as Auditor General while Li Keqiang was the Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 刘家义接替李金华出任中华人民共和国审计署审计长。
description.en: Liu Jiayi succeeded Li Jinhua as the Auditor General of the National Audit Office of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 胡泽君接替刘家义出任中华人民共和国审计署审计长。
description.en: Hu Zejun succeeded Liu Jiayi as the Auditor General of the National Audit Office of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党山东省委员会

description.zh-cn: 刘家义接替姜异康出任中共山东省委书记。
description.en: Liu Jiayi succeeded Jiang Yikang as the Secretary of the Shandong Provincial Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 李干杰接替刘家义出任中共山东省委书记。
description.en: Li Ganjie succeeded Liu Jiayi as the Secretary of the Shandong Provincial Committee of the CCP.

relationships.target: 山东省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 习近平签署第68号主席令，决定免去刘家义的中华人民共和国审计署审计长职务。
description.en: Xi Jinping signed the 68th Presidential Order, deciding to remove Liu Jiayi from the post of Auditor General of the National Audit Office of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会
全国人民代表大会财政经济委员会

position.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会财政经济委员会副主任委员
position.en: Vice Chairman of the Financial and Economic Affairs Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 刘家义担任全国人民代表大会财政经济委员会副主任委员时，徐绍史是主任委员。
description.en: When Liu Jiayi served as Vice Chairman of the Financial and Economic Affairs Committee of the National People's Congress, Xu Shaoshi was the Chairman.

中国共产党第十九届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 向刘家义颁发一等独立勋章。
description.en: Awarded the First Class Order of Independence to Liu Jiayi.
